DISCUSSION_TOPICS.title: Post Introduction
DISCUSSION_TOPICS.message:
This is an asynchronous online class. One of the goals is to strive to build community and online friends through discussions. Let's get started by introducing yourself:

  • Do you have Pets? (Feel free to post a picture(s))

  • What are you expecting to get out of the class?

  • How did you learn about cybersecurity?

I encourage everyone to update their profile in Canvas. Click in the upper left corner labeled: Account icon (left), select Profile and edit to add an optional picture or a pic of your pet(s), short bio and link. For an example, see my profile under 'People' in this course.

When you're done, click 'Next' to learn about me and ask questions.

DISCUSSION_TOPICS.title: Water Cooler (non-chapter questions / misc chat)
DISCUSSION_TOPICS.message: Ask Anything, non-discussion board related. Open discussions are encouraged, share interesting links
